entries.meaning: (dated) Any of certain South American monkeys of the genus Ateles, especially Ateles paniscus.
examples: All these facts, even the worms in the intestines, correspond with our coaitas. [â€¦] It is obvious, therefore, that the exquima of Marcgrave is a sapajou of the same species, or, at least, of a species very nearly allied to that of the coaita.
